title: tEDi vandEn dEvarkkum
sahitya:
tEDi vandEn dEvarkkum ariya tirumAlE unran tiruvaDi tanil iDam


anupallavi

  kOTi janmameDutt-iLaittu vADi nADip-pughal tarum nAthan nIyenrarindu


caraNam    hariyE aravaNaittuyil AdimUlamE iru nAngezhuttuDai IdilamudE un
 urukkANa uLLam urugi Unurugi eDuttiru karanguvittEttip-paNindu
			madhyamakAlam
aiyanun oppuyarvillA nAmattai Odi manam maunattAl pakkuvam aDaindiDa nAn
